import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import MainController from"./Components/MainController";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[authCode,setAuthCode]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const cookieName="auth_code";// Replace with your cookie's name
const value="; ".concat(document.cookie);const parts=value.split("; ".concat(cookieName,"="));if(parts.length===2){setAuthCode(parts.pop().split(";").shift());}console.log("Auth Code:",authCode);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainController,{authCode:authCode})});}export default App;
